name: Hermes: Infinite Phase
blurb: Hermes is a strategic multiplayer online battle arena game where three factions battle each other in rated and persistent battles.

rewards.reward: This pledge will certify you a seat on the appreciation page of our site. Anybody that visits our website will know that you were part of the reason we succeeded.
Name on appreciation list on website\r\nLetter of appreciation.
